testcaseName: Pentacel at 7 yrs; # 1 at age < 12 mo.   Off label use.
forecastTestType: Recommended based on minimum interval from previous dose (catch-up)
generalDescription: This test case describes when a child is administered a first dose of the Polio vaccine (Pentacel) at less than 12 months of age and a second dose of the vaccine at 7 years of age that the doses are valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
reasonForChange: Updated the Forecast Dose number to 3. Updated DOB to curb future date issues.
